mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lol_arena_augment (id, api_name, name, description, tooltip, rarity_id, icon_large, icon_small, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{apiName}, #{name}, #{description}, #{tooltip}, #{rarityId}, #{iconLarge}, #{iconSmall}, NOW(), NOW()) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET api_name = #{apiName}, name = #{name}, description = #{description}, tooltip = #{tooltip}, rarity_id = #{rarityId}, icon_large = #{iconLarge}, icon_small = #{iconSmall}, updated_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT id, api_name as apiName, name, description, tooltip, rarity_id as rarityId, icon_large as iconLarge, icon_small as iconSmall, created_at as createdAt, updated_at as updatedAt FROM lol_arena_augment WHERE id = #{id}
